com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util

Class NullWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.NullWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable

    public final class NullWriter
extends Writer
    A writer that just throws the information in the bit-bucket. This is used in several of the internal unit tests.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis
